bug.author: komodovaran
bug.summary: NoneType option returns DeltaGenerator object instead
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Widgets with None as the chosen option returns a DeltaGenerator object instead. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>import streamlit as st
a = st.radio(options=[None, 1], label="label", index=0) b = st.radio(options=[None, 1], label="label", index=1)
c = st.selectbox(options=[None, 1], label="label", index=0) d = st.selectbox(options=[None, 1], label="label", index=1)
print(a) print(b) print(c) print(d) </denchmark-code>
This outputs <denchmark-code><streamlit.DeltaGenerator.DeltaGenerator object at 0x7fa3de516710> 1 <streamlit.DeltaGenerator.DeltaGenerator object at 0x7fa3de516710> 1 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: (0.53 (also didn't work on 0.52) Python version: (3.7.3)
